Uses of Class
jakarta.faces.application.StateManager.SerializedView

Packages that use StateManager.SerializedView 
Package Description
jakarta.faces.application  
jakarta.faces.render  

  • Uses of StateManager.SerializedView in jakarta.faces.application

    Methods in jakarta.faces.application that return StateManager.SerializedView 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    StateManager.SerializedView StateManager.saveSerializedView​(FacesContext context)
    Deprecated.
    this has been replaced by StateManager.saveView(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext).
    StateManager.SerializedView StateManagerWrapper.saveSerializedView​(FacesContext context)
    The default behavior of this method is to call StateManager.saveSerializedView(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext) on the wrapped StateManager object.
    Methods in jakarta.faces.application with parameters of type StateManager.SerializedView 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void StateManager.writeState​(FacesContext context, StateManager.SerializedView state)
    Deprecated.
    This method has been replaced by StateManager.writeState(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext,java.lang.Object).
    void StateManagerWrapper.writeState​(FacesContext context, StateManager.SerializedView state)
    The default behavior of this method is to call StateManager.writeState(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext, jakarta.faces.application.StateManager.SerializedView) on the wrapped StateManager object.

  • Uses of StateManager.SerializedView in jakarta.faces.render

    Methods in jakarta.faces.render with parameters of type StateManager.SerializedView 
    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Deprecated.
    This method has been replaced by ResponseStateManager.writeState(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext,java.lang.Object).
